CANdex

Directory of Alberta Neuroscientists

The CANdex is a new public database of neuroscience and mental health researchers across Alberta. Our goal is to build a central site for Principal Investigators, Postdoctoral Fellows, and trainees to share information and connect with other researchers and for other interested parties to learn more about neuroscience and mental health research activities taking place across the province.


CAN supports several thematic research foci; members involved in these disciplines, as well as CAN leaders, can be found by choosing a topic or committee from the CAN Connections dropdown.


CANdex is a voluntary database, and Alberta neuroscience & mental health researchers who are not members are displayed at the bottom of the search page. To become a member simply click on Create Your Profile to join the growing province-wide network! CANdex members who meet the criteria for CAN programs can apply using the forms available on the CAN Programs Page.



Search input is only required for one of the following criteria. Use multiple inputs to narrow a search. Click here for instructions to create your CANdex profile.
